text: Dang bu xinyang zhe xinhuai kuangwang——mengmei shidai de kuangwang shi, an la jiang zhenjing gei ta de shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen, bing shi tamen jianchi qianjing ci [chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu]. Tamen dui qianjing ci shi zui you quan de, shi zui ying de de. An la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
